resources.string: Simply Blood is a FREE blood Donation app available for Android smartphones. Simply Blood searches, notifies and connect thousands of blood donors in three simple steps. Simply Blood donation app ensures hassle free blood donation and privacy of a blood donor. A blood donor can select any specific date and location to donate blood and find a suitable person who needs blood. Connecting blood donors and needy reduces time which increases the possibility of saving lives and also eliminates the shortage of blood.
